Html:
Hey folks,

I am trying to install Kigg on a VPS with mySQL. I followed the deployment guide and configuring EF etc. Now when I try to hit my site (http://www.unity3dnews.com) I get the following error..

Directory Listing Denied

This Virtual Directory does not allow contents to be listed.

I have .Net framework 3.5 sp1 installed as well as ASP.NET MVC. I did some searching on this forum and it seems like IIS needs specific settings for ASP.NET MVC, so could anyone tell me how to configure it?

Hmm, I think I need to follow the directions on this blog article and get extension-less URLs configured for IIS 6 using an Isapi module.


I`ll try that sometime and report back. Any other suggestions?

 

Update: http://haacked.com/archive/2008/11/26/asp.net-mvc-on-iis-6-walkthrough.aspx . This link helped me setup ASP.NET MVC properly on IIS6. Now I am having a different issue (first an asp.net error saying I have no permissions to access global.asax, and now its just doing nothing in firefox, and showing a 500 internal server error on IE).


Atleast asp.net MVC is working....i`ll keep digging into it.

Hi,

You got a solution for this ? I am getting the same error.

 

Regards
